title: Alone In My Memories
description: When Katherine wakes up out of a coma, she is unable to recall the last Seven years of her life. She finds herself married, not to Caleb her college boyfriend of two years, but to the man that she dislikes the most, Myles Manley. It would have been easy to distance herself from Myles, to walk away from their marriage, but Katherine is told that they have two children and a baby on the way. She is puzzled and struggles to find the answers that would shed some light to her actions, and is tormented with the thought of how she could have gone against her heart and married Myles...
author: Dallacey E. Green
